product_description: Fight bad breath at the source, with this DenTek Metal Tongue Scraper. Bacteria in the mouth can cause bad breath and may contribute to other oral health problems. For fresher breath and better overall oral health, scrape your tongue twice a day to remove bacteria. Made from medical grade stainless steel, DenTek’s Metal Tongue Scraper features a narrow head and contoured design that matches the curves of your tongue, and it’s dishwasher-safe. Be sure to rinse your tongue scraper with warm water before and after each use. Scrape once in the morning and again before bed, and put your tongue scraper in the dishwasher regularly, to keep it clean. Up your mouth game, with DenTek.
